metadata.title: CVE-2022-3308 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in developer tools in Google Chrome priorto 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform a sandboxescape via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
